Class PlanContribution

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.ufrgs.inf.bdi4jade.plan.PlanContribution

  • public class PlanContribution
extends java.lang.Object
    This class stores the probability of a plan promoting a value with respect to a softgoal.
    Author:
    ingrid
